about_the_game:
Exodus, a realtime strategy PC game featuring stunning photorealistic graphics, oldschool RTS gameplay mechanics mixed with our own fresh ideas and a thrilling horror infused story about a dystopian alternative timeline of human history.
A universe where nothing is what it seems and foes are always watching you, lurking in the shady corners of your fears.

Some of our features are:

- a story driven game that spans from mesolithic throughout a dystopian history to a dark future.

- base building, expand your territory, survive the ever present apocalypse.

- collecting and refining resources to improve your settlement, city and outposts.

- micromanage your troops, units, buildings, every decision counts.

- manage single or multiple units at the same time, coordinate attacks, defense, be the leader your faction desperately needs.

- epic battles both on land and at sea

- a large selection of different unique units and buildings

- day and night cycle, with unique gameplay mechanics attached to it. The fear of the dark and the salvation of the light.

- different weather conditions, fight through storms and thrive throw blizzards.

- vehicles for transporting troops, deploy your army through land air and sea, the world awaits your approach to the art of war.
